string.value: EXP 1,500\r\nCan proceed to 'JM From tha Streetz's Take' quest.\r\n
I just wonder why he never comes out of the Jazz Bar. Maybe he's active only when everyone is asleep? \r\n#L0##bI don't really know.#l\n#k

His mysteriousness certainly adds to his charm, but it also makes me wonder if there is some secret that he is keeping. Not that it would bother me if he did, because I like finding out about other people's secrets. Say, do you think you can find out something for me?
People around town have been talking about the thieving Spores, and I'd like to know what that's all about... Could you ask #bJM From tha Streetz#k for me?
I've told you so much, and you won't even do this little favor for me?

Yo! Whatcha like to know? I've been around the block a few times, so I can tell when someone is sniffing for some info!\r\n#L0##bIt's really nothing big... I just thought you might know something about the thieving Spores.#l\n#k
For real? You came to me just to ask me that?
The thieving Spores were nothing more than a few scoundrels that used to go around pulling pranks.
I think you should ask #bJM From tha Streetz#k about the thieving Spores.
